      • DrawPixel

        public void DrawPixel(int x,
                      int y,
                      byte alpha,
                      byte blue,
                      byte green,
                      byte red)
        Sets a pixel at (x,y) to the (alpha, blue, green, red) value
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of the pixel
        y - Y coord of the pixel
        alpha - Alpha value of the pixel color
        blue - Blue value of the pixel color
        green - Green value of the pixel color
        red - Red value of the pixel color
